texts: We will send a confirmation if your renewal has been approved.
We aim to respond to you within the next 10 working days.
Your renewal is now being processed.
We will let you know the outcome by your preferred communication channel.
If your discount is due to expire and has not been renewed by the expiry date, you will need to pay the charge from that date.
If your discount has already expired you need to pay the charge until you receive confirmation it has been renewed successfully.
